/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with power lines and buildings, creating a sense of urban density. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts a bright light over the scene, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
